action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: I am starting with a commonly used five-letter English word that has a good mix of vowels and consonants.
guess: house

attempts = 1
target_word = caddy
guess = house
guess_feedback = h<red> o<red> u<red> s<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: h<red> o<red> u<red> s<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: Since all letters in the word "house" are incorrect, my next guess will be a completely new five-letter English word that is also commonly used, in an attempt to find at least one correct letter.
guess: stamp

attempts = 2
target_word = caddy
guess = stamp
guess_feedback = s<red> t<red> a<yellow> m<red> p<red>

guess_feedback: s<red> t<red> a<yellow> m<red> p<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "a" in the word "stamp" is correct but in the wrong position, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letter "a" and tries to find more correct letters.
guess: angel

attempts = 3
target_word = caddy
guess = angel
guess_feedback = a<yellow> n<red> g<red> e<red> l<red>

guess_feedback: a<yellow> n<red> g<red> e<red> l<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "a" is still correct but in the wrong position, and all other letters in the word "angel" are incorrect, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letter "a" in a different position and introduces new letters.
guess: algae

attempts = 4
target_word = caddy
guess = algae
guess_feedback = a<yellow> l<red> g<red> a<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: a<yellow> l<red> g<red> a<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "a" is still correct but in the wrong position, and all other letters in the word "algae" are incorrect, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letter "a" in a different position, and also tries to utilize common word patterns and letter combinations.
guess: award

attempts = 5
target_word = caddy
guess = award
guess_feedback = a<yellow> w<red> a<red> r<red> d<yellow>

guess_feedback: a<yellow> w<red> a<red> r<red> d<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "a" and "d" are correct but in the wrong positions, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letters "a" and "d" in different positions, and also tries to find the correct letters to accompany them.
guess: adept

attempts = 6
target_word = caddy
guess = adept
guess_feedback = a<yellow> d<yellow> e<red> p<red> t<red>

guess_explanation: I am starting with a commonly used five-letter English word that has a good mix of vowels and consonants.
Since all letters in the word "house" are incorrect, my next guess will be a completely new five-letter English word that is also commonly used, in an attempt to find at least one correct letter.
The letter "a" in the word "stamp" is correct but in the wrong position, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letter "a" and tries to find more correct letters.

The letter "a" is still correct but in the wrong position, and all other letters in the word "angel" are incorrect, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letter "a" in a different position and introduces new letters.

The letter "a" is still correct but in the wrong position, and all other letters in the word "algae" are incorrect, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letter "a" in a different position, and also tries to utilize common word patterns and letter combinations.

The letters "a" and "d" are correct but in the wrong positions, so my next guess will be a new five-letter English word that includes the letters "a" and "d" in different positions, and also tries to find the correct letters to accompany them.
